TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RegistrationClassContext extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the set of execution contexts in which a class object will be made available for requests to construct instances.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The values in the RegistrationClassContext enumeration are used in the `classContext` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationServices.RegisterTypeForComClients%2A> method. These values are the same as those defined in the COM **CLSCTX** enumeration, which is used as the `dwClsContext` parameter in calls to the COM API `CoRegisterClassObject`.
For more information about `CoRegisterClassObject` and the **CLSCTX** enumeration, see the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext DisableActivateAsActivator = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: Disables activate-as-activator (AAA) activations for this activation only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext EnableActivateAsActivator = int32(65536)

Docs.summary: Enables activate-as-activator (AAA) activations for this activation only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext EnableCodeDownload = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: Allows the downloading of code from the Directory Service or the Internet.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext FromDefaultContext = int32(131072)

Docs.summary: Begin this activation from the default context of the current apartment.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext InProcessHandler = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The code that manages objects of this class is an in-process handler.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext InProcessHandler16 = int32(32)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext InProcessServer = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The code that creates and manages objects of this class is a DLL that runs in the same process as the caller of the function specifying the class context.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext InProcessServer16 = int32(8)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext LocalServer = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The EXE code that creates and manages objects of this class runs on same machine but is loaded in a separate process space.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext NoCodeDownload = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: Disallows the downloading of code from the Directory Service or the Internet.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext NoCustomMarshal = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: Specifies whether activation fails if it uses custom marshaling.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext NoFailureLog = int32(16384)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext RemoteServer = int32(16)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext Reserved1 = int32(64)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext Reserved2 = int32(128)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext Reserved3 = int32(256)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext Reserved4 = int32(512)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext Reserved5 = int32(2048)
